DOC.brief_summary: This single-center , randomize , open-label , multi-dose crossover study assess pharmacokinetic profile diazoxide choline coat versus uncoated formulation healthy volunteer . The primary objective compare pharmacokinetic ( PK ) profile diazoxide choline controlled-release coat tablet versus uncoated tablet healthy volunteer feed condition . Secondary objective assess diazoxide choline pharmacokinetic ( PK ) parameter fast condition , ass safety tolerability diazoxide choline controlled-release coat tablet versus uncoated tablet healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Open-label Pharmacokinetic Study Diazoxide Choline Coated vs. Uncoated Formulations
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent Healthy male female subject 18 75 year age Body mass index ( BMI ) 2235 kg/m2 Fasting glucose ≤ 125 mg/dL HbA1C ≤ 6.5 . Fasting triglyceride ≥100 mg/dL ≤ 500 mg/dL Not pregnant Significant underlie medical condition Clinical laboratory test value outside accepted range Smokers , tobacco user , subject currently use nicotine product Substance abuse History allergic response ( ) diazoxide relate drug Recent significant weight loss Use medication affect body weight , lipid glucose metabolism Unable comply study procedure
